https://tmrev.io/movie/489291-Dangsan 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null There is a 530-year-old ginkgo tree in Dangsan. This place is named as Dangsan because there is a shrine on top of a mountain called Dansan. I came back to Dangsan, where I lived for 20 years. The thundering noises and the sound of something crumbling break the scenery of Dangsan. Dangsan has been changed a lot. Dangsan
